section.title: Available Downloads
section.p: This page provides instructions on how to download and verify the Apache POI release artifacts. Apache POI is a pure Java library for manipulating Microsoft Documents, for more information please see the project homepage.

li.link: The latest development release is Apache POI 3.8 Beta 1
The latest stable release is Apache POI 3.7

section.p: Apache POI releases are available under the Apache License, Version 2.0. See the NOTICE file contained in each release artifact for applicable copyright attribution notices.
To insure that you have downloaded the true release you should verify the integrity of the files using the signatures and checksums available from this page.

section.title: 7 March 2011 - POI 3.8 beta 1 available
section.p: The Apache POI team is pleased to announce the release of 3.8 beta 1. This includes a large number of bug fixes and enhancements.
A full list of changes is available in the change log. People interested should also follow the dev list to track progress.

The POI source release as well as the pre-built binary deployment packages are listed below. Pre-built versions of all POI components are available in the central Maven repository under Group ID "org.apache.poi" and Version "3.8-beta1".

section.title: 29 October 2010 - POI 3.7 available
section.p: The Apache POI team is pleased to announce the release of 3.7. Featured are significant performance improvements and numerous bug fixes. See the full release notes for more details.
A full list of changes is available in the change log. People interested should also follow the dev list to track progress.

The POI source release as well as the pre-built binary deployment packages are listed below. Pre-built versions of all POI components are available in the central Maven repository under Group ID "org.apache.poi" and Version "3.7".

section.title: Verify
section.p: It is essential that you verify the integrity of the downloaded files using the PGP or MD5 signatures. Please read Verifying Apache HTTP Server Releases for more information on why you should verify our releases. This page provides detailed instructions which you can use for POI artifacts.

section.title: Release Archives
section.p: Apache POI became a top level project in June 2007 and POI 3.0 aritfacts were re-released. Prior to that date POI was a sub-project of Apache Jakarta.
